automaticdoors-fabric.duskconfig.title: Automatic Doors Config
automaticdoors-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_do: The time in ms the door should stay open.
automaticdoors-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_sh: When enabled, iron doors will also be opened automatically.
automaticdoors-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_pr: When enabled, doors won't be opened automatically when the player is sneaking.
